授業目的: To develop oral communication skills for a variety of common situations
到達目標:
By the end of the course, participants will be better able to

*express their ideas on a range of common and interesting topics
*communicate effectively in a number of transactional scenarios
*interact in various social and group work scenarios
*comprehend both natural and graded listening tasks
*improve ability to use and comprehend selected pronunciation features, including weak forms, prominence and word stress
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: Classes will be interactive and group-work based, with some language and skills guidance from the teacher. Learners are expected to participate actively in all tasks to gain the maximum benefit to their spoken English skills. There will be a range of spoken tasks, including group discussions, mini presentations, supported by reading & listening tasks. Materials will include a selection from the textbook as well as additional materials distributed in class and on LUNA.
